plot: Sreekumar does all the domestic work in his family while his banker wife Suja is the breadwinner. All appears to be smooth until Tommy enters their life bringing back something which Sreekumar wants to run away from.
title: Salaam Kashmier
plot_es: Sreekumar does all the domestic work in his family while his banker wife Suja is the breadwinner. All appears to be smooth until Tommy enters their life bringing back something which Sreekumar wants to run away from.
